OVERVIEW


 
Balancing practical experience with an informed assessment of emerging issues and best practices, this conference brings you the latest techniques and methods for managing, measuring, and monitoring physical and financial uncertainty to optimize the overall performance of your energy portfolio. 
 
The conference embraces the latest developments in risk management and focuses on methods to mitigate uncertainty for power generators, utilities, and marketers. Hear current industry perspectives on risk management practices that have moved from measurement and controls to a proactive business strategy that maximizes value and efficiency of portfolio elements. 
 
This year’s conference builds on the previous year’s issues and highlights the current, cutting edge strategies for addressing physical and financial uncertainty in the power industry.
 
 
CONFERENCE HIGHLIGHTS  

Accurately assessing risk exposure in today’s volatile energy market

Employing risk management techniques that recognize the physical characteristics of your portfolio elements

Understanding the factors affecting asset value

Actively managing organizational risks

Assessing the impact of selected strategies on corporate financess
                        Who Should Attend


This conference is ideally suited for CROs, CFOs, EVPs, SVPs, VPs, directors and managers of risk, regulators, power marketers, energy risk consultants, power financiers and investors, and utility professionals engaged in physical and financial risk management activities.
